origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'InvestmentAPI.analyze_trends', 'description': 'This function analyzes the trends in foreign direct investment based on the type of report, number of years, and type of analysis.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'reportType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of investment report, e.g., FDI, portfolio.'}, {'name': 'years', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of years to analyze.'}, {'name': 'analysisType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of analysis to perform, e.g., country_industry, economic_conditions.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysisResult', 'description': 'The result of the investment trend analysis.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 InvestmentAPI.analyze_trends, 它的参数输入如下: 'reportType'是'FDI', 'years'是'5', 'analysisType'是'country_industry'.
